plot: The murder of Commissioner Hamrlik and the involvement of corrupt officers cause a media frenzy, while Suk investigates Petrov's orphanage.

After the death of his seniors, Suk is left to re-investigate case from the very beginning. He gets information from the orphans about a meeting with Grimmer. His intention to arrest Grimmer takes a different turn however when he gets deeper into the investigation. This also reveals that there is more to the nameless lady at the bar than she lets on.—TheTVDB
